title: Headlines
subTitle: The presenter reports the latest and most important political and socio-economic news headlines from India and around the world.

title: Breaking News
subTitle: The host presents numerous top stories, latest happenings and significant updates from the national and international front.

title: News Bulletin
subTitle: The hosts present some of the latest updates, current affairs and developments pertaining to economic, political and social issues.

title: Top 10 News
subTitle: The host presents the top 10 news updates concerning the political, social, economic and sports fronts from around the country and the world.

title: Fatafat News
subTitle: The host presents the latest news stories and updates from various spheres including politics, business and current affairs in a quick succession.

title: Special Report
subTitle: The host presents some of the latest news stories, current affairs and developments pertaining to economics, politics and sports.

title: Crime Bulletin
subTitle: The reporter sheds light on unscrupulous activities that conspire in society in order to promote vigilance against threats from anti-social elements.

subTitle: The host presents the latest news and developments surrounding various socio-economic and political issues and provides updates on current events.
